item.title: vRealize Automation 8.x - Setup Amazon Web Services Cloud Account
item.description: vRealize Automation 8.x can integrate with several cloud providers, and to do this for your Amazon Web Services (AWS) environment, select Cloud Assembly > Infrastructure > Connections > Cloud Accounts and create each of the cloud integrations you require. For AWS, we simply need to head over to the AWS Console console.aws.amazon.comÂ and authenticate with the account which has access to the AWS account you want to integrate with. To integrate vRA 8.
